title: Alquiler de ático en Calle de Nunyo Sanç s/n
description:
(2025) Exclusive 240 m² Penthouse with Private Pool & Sea Views

This exceptional penthouse, located in a prime area of Santa Ponsa, offers 200 m² of luxury living space, a private pool, and a 20 m² terrace with panoramic sea views. 

The property features 4 bedrooms (2 en suite) and 3 modern bathrooms, complemented by high-end finishes, premium furniture, and state-of-the-art amenities. Situated on the 4th floor of a newly built complex, the apartment boasts partial sea views and overlooks the vibrant surroundings of Santa Ponsa. 

Layout:
- Spacious open-plan kitchen-dining area with pantry and laundry room. 
- Bright, inviting living room with direct access to the terrace. 
- Long hallway leading to 4 bedrooms (2 with en suite bathrooms) and additional bathrooms. 

Communal Areas: 
- Landscaped gardens and solarium. 
- Expansive infinity pool with sun terraces. 

Premium Extras:
- Satellite TV, underfloor heating, air conditioning, LED lighting. 
- Video intercom, Dolby surround sound system. 
- Zennio KNX smart home system (controls AC, heating, blinds, and lighting). 
- **No pets allowed. ** Minimum rental period: 12 months. 

Additional Details:
- 2 parking spaces included. 
- Security deposit: €8,000 x 3 (covers 3 months’ rent, including community fees). Utilities extra.
